amendment.description: Amendment requires a report to Congress on the feasibility of student loan consolidation options to assist individuals who have substantial student loan debt, other than direct student loans and Federally guaranteed loans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 58 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998, to study consolidation options with respect to students who have borrowed loans from private sources (other than direct student loans or federally guaranteed student loans).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
